${ModID}:DiscardNextTurnPower.NAME: Discard Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: Discard !A! card next turn.
Discard !A! cards next turn.

${ModID}:DrawNextTurnPower.NAME: Draw Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw !A! card next turn.
Draw !A! cards next turn.

${ModID}:EnergyDownNextTurnPower.NAME: Energy Reduction
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose [E] at the start of your next turn.
Lose !A! [E] at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:SoulFlameBarrierPower.NAME: Guarding Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !A! [${ModID}:DemonFireIcon] damage back.

${ModID}:ResonatingPower.NAME: Resonating
DESCRIPTIONS: Adds a #yResonant card to your hand at the start of your next turn.
Resonating Intensifies

${ModID}:FrostbitePower.NAME: Frostbite
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever this enemy attacks, it suffers !A! damage.

${ModID}:ResonantCostZeroPower.NAME: Tuning Fork
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #yResonant card you play costs 0.
The next !A! #yResonant cards you play cost 0.

${ModID}:SummonMonsterPower.NAME: Pandamonium
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain an Orb slot and Channel a Panda that deals !A! damage.

${ModID}:SiphonPower.NAME: Siphoning
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal Attack damage, gain !A! Temporary HP.

${ModID}:EnergizedExilePower.NAME: Energized
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b !A! additional [E] next turn.

${ModID}:RingingPower.NAME: Ringing
DESCRIPTIONS: Loses !A! HP at the start of its turn.

${ModID}:TempNegStrengthPower.NAME: Damage Down
DESCRIPTIONS: Does !A! less damage with attacks this turn.

${ModID}:CrushedPower.NAME: Crushed
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! more damage from attacks.

${ModID}:BarbedPower.NAME: Barbed
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! damage when attacked.

${ModID}:ConvertPower.NAME: ConvertPower
DESCRIPTIONS: The next non-power non-exhausting Exile card you play becomes ${ModID}:Resonant.
The next !A! non-power non-exhausting Exile cards you play become ${ModID}:Resonant.

${ModID}:SharpNoisePower.NAME: Sharp Noise
DESCRIPTIONS: Resonant cards deal !A! additional damage per Resonance.

${ModID}:AcousticsPower.NAME: Acoustics
DESCRIPTIONS: Resonant cards target ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ElegantEtchingPower.NAME: Elegant Etching
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #ySigil, apply !A! #yJinx to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:HarmonyPower.NAME: Harmony
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn gain #yBlock equal to your #yResonance amount times !A!.

${ModID}:AnticipatePower.NAME: Anticipate
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate to draw a card and discard a card. !A! use left.
Activate to draw a card and discard a card. !A! uses left.

${ModID}:TargetedPower.NAME: Targeted
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes 50% more damage from Attacks when #yWeakened.

${ModID}:JinxPower.NAME: Jinx
DESCRIPTIONS: When debuffed with another debuff, this creature will lose !A! HP.

${ModID}:NoceboPower.NAME: Nocebo
DESCRIPTIONS: This doesn't do anything.

${ModID}:HastePower.NAME: Haste
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, you may spend [E] to draw 3 cards.
!A! times per turn, you may spend [E] to draw 3 cards.
Spend [E] to draw 3 cards.

${ModID}:ConsumeSoulsPower.NAME: Consume Souls
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a non-minion enemy dies, gain !A! Max HP.

${ModID}:StoneskinPower.NAME: Stoneskin
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would take damage this turn, take !A! less.

${ModID}:CrumblingPower.NAME: Crumbling
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! % extra damage from non-Attacks.

${ModID}:GolemPower.NAME: Golem
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain !A! % more Block.

${ModID}:DecayPower.NAME: Decay
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! extra damage from non-Attacks.

${ModID}:FocusedPower.NAME: Focused
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn you may put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
!A! times per turn you may put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:SpiritPressurePower.NAME: Spirit Pressure
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yJinx, apply !A! more.

${ModID}:SpinningSigilPower.NAME: Spinning
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yJinx, apply !A! more.

${ModID}:ManaBurstPower.NAME: Mana Burst
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you discard a #ySigil each turn, gain [E].
The first !A! times you discard a #ySigil each turn, gain [E].

${ModID}:ExileStudyPower.NAME: Study
DESCRIPTIONS: In !A! turns, choose 1 of !A2! cards to add into your hand.

${ModID}:ElementalProwessPower.NAME: Elemental Prowess
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, ALL enemies take !A! damage of each damage type it had.

${ModID}:LifeTapPower.NAME: Life Tap
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attack this enemy gain !A! Temporary_HP.

${ModID}:CallOfTheGravePower.NAME: Death Approaches
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! damage for each of its debuffs at the start of its turn.

${ModID}:VitalityPower.NAME: Vitality
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would discard a status, exhaust it and draw a card.
Whenever you would discard a status, exhaust it and draw !A! cards.

${ModID}:SadisticGleePower.NAME: Sadistic Glee
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain !A! #yBlock whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy.

${ModID}:SlipperyPower.NAME: Slippery
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time you would take Attack damage, reduce it by half.
The next !A! times you would take Attack damage, reduce it by half.

${ModID}:ChargePower.NAME: Charge
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next attack deals !A!% more damage.
